[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

open Nat Set

noncomputable abbrev omnimath3204_answer : ℝ := sorry
theorem omnimath3204 :
    IsGreatest
      {∑ i : Fin 10, Real.cos (3 * x i) | (x : Fin 10 → ℝ) (hx : ∑ i : Fin 10, Real.cos (x i) = 0)}
      omnimath3204_answer :=
  sorry
